header.title: Composite Privacy Consent Directive Domain Analysis

div1.head: Composite Privacy Consent Directive Domain Analysis 1.0

div2.head: Domain Analysis for Composite Privacy: PDF Publication

p.emph: (Hint: Right-click and select 'Save Target As...' to download a copy to your desktop for viewing, or right-click and select 'Open in New Window' to maintain the current frameset.)

div2.head: Domain Analysis for Composite Privacy: UML Model
div2.p:
To view the source model used to generate the Composite Privacy Directive specification, download the model file and open it using an Eclipse-based UML tool (e.g. Rational Software Modeler). The UML model can be used as a starting point or building block for a project team.
(Hint: To download the file, right-click the link and select 'Save Target As...' to download a copy to your desktop for viewing.)

div3.head: References
div3.p: The Domain Analysis Model conforms to the HL7 Development Framework (HDF). For more information on the process and artifacts (HDF): http://hl7projects.hl7.nscee.edu/projects/hdf/
